summary: Crunch Calhoun, a semi-reformed art thief, agrees to get his old gang back together to pull off one last heist.
cast: Kurt Russell|Matt Dillon|Jay Baruchel|Kenneth Welsh|Chris Diamantopoulos|Katheryn Winnick|Jason Jones|Terence Stamp|Devon Bostick|Elle Downs|Durward Allan|Dax Ravina|Jasmin Geljo|Vieslav Krystyan|Stephen McHattie|Eugene Lipinski|Mike Wilmot|James Collins|A.C. Peterson|Rob deLeeuw|Karyn Dwyer|Christopher Dyson|Maria Lerinman|Scott McCrickard|Joe Pingue|Camilla Scott|Jon Steinberg|Juan Carlos Velis|K. Trevor Wilson|Steven Lee Wright|Kyle Hytonen|Sandy Kellerman|Ron Laugher|Michael McNaughton
title: El arte de robar
